-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
--                             This is ASPECT                              --
-- The Advanced Solver for Planetary Evolution, Convection, and Tectonics. --
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
--     . version 2.6.0-pre (master_TwoD, 48eae0e61)
--     . using deal.II 9.5.0
--     .       with 32 bit indices and vectorization level 2 (256 bits)
--     . using Trilinos 13.2.0
--     . using p4est 2.3.2
--     . running in OPTIMIZED mode
--     . running with 64 MPI processes
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Vectorization over 4 doubles = 256 bits (AVX), VECTORIZATION_LEVEL=2
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- For information on how to cite ASPECT, see:
--   https://aspect.geodynamics.org/citing.html?ver=2.6.0-pre&GWB=1&NewtonSolver=1&dg=1&mf=1&sha=48eae0e61&src=code
